name: Shoulder Surfing
command: cd /; python3 /scripts/ss_inference.py --pb /scripts/shoulder_surfing.pb --input_images /lattice/dataset/#datasetname/ --mode image && pushd /lattice/dataset/#datasetname && mkdir training && mkdir training/labels/ && mkdir training/images && mkdir ImageSets && cp /inference_output/predictions/* training/labels/ && mv *.{png,jpg,jpeg} training/images/; ls training/images/ | grep '.jpg\|.jpeg\|.png' | sed -E 's/.jpg|.jpeg|.png//' > ImageSets/train.txt; popd
